name: small ammo can

name: heavy-duty ammo can

HIGH EXPLOSIVE DUAL PURPOSE M433 LINKED</color>

name: double 84mm HEDP container
description: Huge metal container, in a shape of two massive rockets.

variants.description:
A heavy and bulky container in a shape of two recoilless rifle rounds.  Text on the front says:
<color_yellow>1 RD
84MM HEDP 502
1315-01-343-1944</color>

<color_red>EXPLOSIVE</color>

A heavy and bulky container in a shape of two recoilless rifle rounds.  Text on the front says:
<color_yellow>1 RD
84MM HE 441D</color>

name: 84mm HE crate
description: Relatively small metal box.  On one side it has label "EXPLOSIVE"

variants.description:
A big metal crate.  On one side it has label "EXPLOSIVE", and on another is written:
<color_yellow>6 RDS 84MM HE</color>

A big metal crate.  On one side it has label "EXPLOSIVE", and on another is written:
<color_yellow>6 RDS 84MM HEDP</color>

description: A small brown box without a cover.
A beige collapsible drum with a water valve and D-Rings.  Text on its top clearly says "POTABLE WATER ONLY".

description: A black collapsible drum with a valve and D-Rings.  Yellow text on its top clearly says "FLAMMABLE".  Empty and collapsed, it could be moved elsewhere.
